opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: American Civil Liberties Union v. Federal Election Commission

opinion:
539 U.S. 981

American Civil Liberties Union
v.
Federal Election Commission et al.

No. 02-1734.

Supreme Court of United States.

August 25, 2003.

1

Appeal from the D. C. D. C. [Probable jurisdiction noted, ante, p. 911.]

2

Motion of plaintiffs Senator Mitch McConnell et al. to file volume VI of the joint appendix under seal granted. Motion of the intervenor-defendants to file their brief under seal with redacted copies for the public record granted.
